body:
Guys, I'd really appreciate if you could please like an EDM set a friend made for a contest. All you gotta do is go on Soundcloud and like the last track he uploaded. Here's the link: https://soundcloud.com/dj3aus/vives-forero-dj-contest

I'd also appreciate if you could not archive this since I'm not gaining anything out of doing this.

replies.body:
This post doesn't break any rules, and can't be really considered as spam.

I personally am not a fan of stuff like "help my friend by liking this plsss" posts but there's no reason for it to get locked, unless the replies get bad / go off topic.
